name: Super Block Crush
description:
Super block crash is a new Breakout game, with a sprinkle of RPG.

FEATURES


Block Alien suddenly attack, and you've stepped up in order to protect the world!

Shoot, Smash, Level up, Collect items.

  • Crush all the block！
  • 11 kinds of Blocks, 17 kinds of game props.
  • 120 game levels.
  • ]5 paddles with different performances.
  • The ultimate challenge for 9 powerful bosses, try to beat them.
  • 18 Special abilities so you can be more comfortable in battle.
  • Collect different Chips for game level.
  • 80+ Achievements.

To All Players

Thank you for your attention and support to Super block crash!
We will continue to work hard to improve, and will launch more fun games in the future!
Please take care of us in the future! Thanks again!
